p: There were no literature reports on the chemical composition and biological activities of the essential oil from P. microphylla. Therefore, we used the hydrodistillation method to collect the oil, and we identified the chemical composition of the oil by GC-FID (Gas Chromatography-Flame Ionization Detection) and GC-MS (Gas Chromatography-Mass Spectrometer). Furthermore, the essential oil was investigated for its antioxidant, antimicrobial, and cytotoxic activities.
